parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name of the website that you want to add to the Anti-DDoS Proxy instance for protection.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: The number of entries that you want the system to skip before the system returns entries. Default value: **0**.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description:
The method used to create the rule. Valid values:

*   **manual** (default): manually created.
*   **clover**: automatically created.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **20**. Default value: **20**.
